entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
